WorkItem.Description:
hello,

Thank you for your great plugin. I'm using this plugin in two ways and on the same page.

I have a news page the main Story has a very big vertical stars and the the oldest topics have horizontal stars which is the same of what you developed. so how I can display stars vertically but don't forget that I need to use horizontal as well.


I did all what I know but I didn't get it vertical. :)

Thank you.
